content: this easy crochet dish towel topper pattern is perfect for making a quick gift when you don t have a lot of time you ll end up wanting to make some for your own kitchen after realizing how simple they are this listing is for a downloadable pdf of a crochet pattern only you will not receive a physical product skill level easy finished size 4 by 5 25 hook size us size 7 4 5 mm yarn samples used category 4 worsted weight yarn main stitches chain puff stitches double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch pattern uses us crochet terms and is available only in english please note that this pattern is available for free on stitching-together com the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy to read printable and ad-free version of the pattern free version 1 1 https //www stitching-together com/crochet-kitchen-towel-topper/
